description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Unleash the awesome power and beauty of an infinite supply of mortar shells.  Take command or just use it as a screen saver.  The choice is yours!  The full version features rumble support, more simultaneous launches, 16 awesome backgrounds, and more!
